!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 2 1 Jun 10, 2003 22:46:04.759
!MESSAGE Problems encountered loading the plug-in registry.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.runtime 2 1 Jun 10, 2003 22:46:04.759
!MESSAGE Plug-in "net.sourceforge.phpeclipse" was disabled due to missing or 
disabled prerequisite plug-in "org.junit".

I don't think the two problems are related. 

The first session has no messages related to plug-ins not being resolved. The
stack traces (NPE) are related to opening the preferences dialog, most
specifically the Debug Actions Group preference page.

In the second session (in the end of the posted log) there are no exception
stack traces, but a third-party plug-in is not being enabled because a
pre-requisite (org.junit) is not available. If you are sure the org.junit is
available and you have steps to reproduce this problem (a plug-in not being
enabled when should), please open a different bug report against Platform/Core.

It looks like you are using a Platform runtime (instead of SDK) with third-party
plug-ins. Which build is that? 

Moving to Platform/Debug so the NPE can be investigated.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 38749 ***
